text: Hemet is a city in the San Jacinto Valley in Riverside County, California. It covers a total area of , about half of the valley, which it shares with the neighboring city of San Jacinto. The population was 89,833 at the 2020 census. == References == == Other websites == * Official website * Hemet Museum * SanJacintoValley.info Information for residents and visitors of Hemet and San Jacinto in San Jacinto Valley, California. * Official Library website Category:1887 establishments in California Category:Cities in California Category:Settlements in Riverside County, California
title: Hemet, California
